PerfectNetExp.abs: asphodel 日影兰, asphodeline 日光兰属, asphodel 阿福花属

means.word_mean: 1. genus of rhizomatous perennial or biennial herbs with numerous sometimes fragrant flowers in long cylindrical racemes; Mediterranean region to Caucasus; sometimes placed in family Asphodelaceae
